c1.name: Sublime Salutations
c1.descriptionRaw: Within 3s after using <color=#FFD780FF>Artistic Ingenuity</color>, Kaveh's <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.
c1.description: Within 3s after using Artistic Ingenuity, Kaveh's Dendro RES and Incoming Healing Bonus will be increased by 50% and 25% respectively.

c2.name: Grace of Royal Roads
c2.descriptionRaw: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color>.
c2.description: Kaveh's Normal Attack SPD increases by 15% during Painted Dome.

c3.name: Profferings of Dur Untash
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Painted Dome by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Feast of Apadana
c4.descriptionRaw: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.
c4.description: Dendro Cores created from Bloom reactions Kaveh triggers will deal 60% more DMG when they burst.

c5.name: Treasures of Bonkhanak
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Artistic Ingenuity</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Artistic Ingenuity by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pairidaeza's Dreams
c6.descriptionRaw: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during <color=#FFD780FF>Painted Dome</color>, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
c6.description: When Kaveh's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents during Painted Dome, they will unleash Pairidaeza's Light upon the opponent's position, dealing 61.8% of Kaveh's ATK as AoE Dendro DMG and causing all Dendro Cores within that AoE to burst. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
